import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import UserAPI from '../API/UserAPI'; function Users(props) { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await UserAPI.getAllData(); console.log(response); setUsers(response.data); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
